subject: Permission for access to Private Property;Fuel Stations;Service Stations;Rest areas etc and laying of underground utilities along National Highways under widening/improvement.
text: HRrf4 <cfl4 <HT gifarhrt TAN4 /Phore 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a Wa67, Hav: @ar7t 37 <oTATT TAT4) #4H /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India Q. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 7-6 Qa 6, #7-10, ERA; 7f @rrit-11O 075 6-5 & &, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.: 11041/21/2002-Admn; December 7 2005 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (61/2005) [Decision taken on CM Division $ file No NHALCMIVIP/2OS} Sub: Permission for Access fo Private Property, Fuel Stations, Service Stations , Rest Areas etc and laying of underground utilities along National Highways under Widening Improvement: The cases related to permission for access to private properties, fuel service stations, rest areas etc as well as for laying of underground utilities within NH ROWs NHs under widening improvement or to be taken up, are being received at HQ level; It has been observed that such cases are not being examined with respect to provisions of junction; median gaps, service roads etc in the proposed DPR. 2. Therefare_ all concerned PIUsICMUs may please ensure that the permission cases falling on the stretches where widening or improvement is underway or to be taken up, should , also be exarined with respect to proposed DPRs This   wodld ensure that the guidelines issued by MoSRT&H are not  violated after widening improvement of the road (G.P. Chand) General Manager (Admn:) to: 1) PS Io Chairman ii) AII Members CGMs/cvo AII GMs iv AII PIUsICMUs v) Hindi Officer Librarian VL along Copy
